data.actual_result: It all says `Granted a permission for Role 3`
data.expected_result: It will say ` Granted a permission for Role 1` `Granted a permission for Role 2` and `Granted a permission to Role 3`
data.short_description: Audit Logs show the same role when chaning channel permissions for *multiple* roles
data.steps_to_repro: - Create some roles or use existing roles (in this case, I made `Role 1`,`Role 2`, and `Role 3`) - Go to the channel permissions (`Edit Channel` Button > Permissions) - Add the roles (don't change any permissions yet untill you add all the roles you will use) - Grant or deny (a) permission/s for all the roles (they could be different permissions for each role) - Click the `Save Changes` Button - Go to the Audit Logs
